name: Bed Bug's Bite!
description:
Not 100% finished,  may need a little polishing.

After waking up on a dark night, you realise your nightmares are coming to life! You have cases of Kinemortophobia, Coulrophobia and also Daemonophobia. You don't know what they are though, you are just 8 years old!

Made by GiantMarble!
